text: Ia nɨghnɨghɨva, egh nguibar igharazimɨn gumaziba ian bighan izamin dughiamɨn, ia me inigh uan dɨpenibar mangɨ. Ia fo, fomɨra gumazamizir maba ghaze, me gumazir kɨniba isa uan dɨpenibar ghua egha men gari. Ezɨ gumazir me inigha izir kaba, me enselba. Me ghaze, me guizɨn gumazibar gari, ezɨ puvatɨ, me enselbara gari.
